content: The solution looks good overall, but I would suggest using more error handling around the authentication check.
The input sanitization approach is not secure enough. Please use a proper escaping library instead of this custom regex.
Updated the error message to be more user-friendly

modifications.before: throw new Error('Authentication failed with error code ' + errorCode);
modifications.after: throw new Error('Unable to authenticate. Please check your credentials and try again.');
